title: App Store Editorial Lead, Greater China
summary: We're searching for a dynamic, highly motivated senior editorial lead with phenomenal ideas and a real passion for content to lead the Greater China App Store editorial team.
description:
- Execute Editorial and Programming Strategy aligned with Global Editorial Strategy and Business Goals.
- Define editorial KPIs and grow the Greater China App Store Editorial performance to these KPIs.
- Develop large-scale creative merchandising campaigns with key apps and games partners.
- Assign, edit, and manage daily content including short-form write-ups, deep dives, developer interviews and long-form articles by staff and freelance writers.
- See original content and stories through from conception to final publish in collaboration with Design, Production, Video and Business teams.
- Act as an expert voice at Apple. If it’s a new app, game, business model or trend, you have an informed perspective on it.
- Correspond with developers and creative professionals who are part of app culture around business goals, campaign ideas, story pitches, and interviews.
- Travel within Greater China and abroad for Editorial training and leadership, as needed.
- Represent the App Store Editorial team at regional events, meet-ups and strategic meetings.
preferred_qualifications:
- Proven success crafting large-scale creative merchandising campaigns with top-tier apps and games developers
- Experience working with Content Management Systems
- Excellent organizational skills with the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously
- Acute attention to detail
- Resourceful, creative, and collaborative
